title: Ben Drury - Designer
content:
Does anyone know where I can find more work/information on Ben Drury. I can’t seem to find much via Google. I know he’s a London-based designer and has quite an eye for custom lettering and type-logos.

This is about the largest collection of his work I’ve found:  
 [http://www.wehaveaproblem.com/exhibitions/drury/trustmelondon.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007001838/http:/www.wehaveaproblem.com/exhibitions/drury/trustmelondon.html "http://www.wehaveaproblem.com/exhibitions/drury/trustmelondon.html")

and I have the [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007001838/http:/www.amazon.com/Futura/dp/1861541341/sr=8-1/qid=1172775004/ref=pd_bbs_sr_1/103-8102982-7102227?ie=UTF8&s=books) book he designed (which if you haven’t seen, is excellent.)
